text: Grimaldi's Pizzeria is an American pizzeria chain from the New York City area. It has over 40 restaurants throughout the United States. Its most famous restaurant is under the Brooklyn Bridge in Brooklyn at 1 Front Street, next door to its original location. It was founded in 1990. ==References== Category:1990s establishments in New York (state) Category:1990 establishments in the United States Category:American restaurants Category:Companies based in New York City
title: Grimaldi's Pizzeria
